events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-30 resulting in significant vehicle damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on the description provided.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to handle all communications and next steps for the claim.
Customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and inform them of the investigation process.
Customer was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates for verification.
Customer promptly provided all requested documents including images of the car damage and official accident report.
The internal claims investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence to confirm claim validity.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the car accident details matched submitted documentation.
A settlement offer was presented to the customer reflecting actual repair costs and policy coverage.
Customer communicated acceptance of the proposed settlement and thanked the agent for clear explanations.
The claim was officially approved for payout based on agreed settlement terms and acceptance by customer.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover the repair expenses as per the approved claim.
The insurance claim was formally closed following successful payment and confirmation from the customer.
